channel.title: Middle East crisis
channel.description:
A panel discussion sponsored June 1, 1967, by University of Chicago Center for Policy Study. Participants: Leonard Binder and William R. Polk of University of Chicago, Tahseen Bashir of Arab States Delegation, Benjamin Halpern of Brandeis University.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Panel discussion, part one
item.description: This program presents the second part of a panel discussion on unrest in the Middle East.
item.dc:creator: University of Chicago
item.dc:subject: World Politics

item.title: Panel discussion, part one
item.description: This program presents the first part of a panel discussion on unrest in the Middle East.
